text: This is a list of all personnel changes for the 2019 Indian Premier League. ==Pre-auction== IPL set the deadline of 15 November for both the trading window and the list of retained and released players. ===Transfers=== After being unhappy with his retention price by Sunrisers Hyderabad, Shikhar Dhawan was rumored to be transferred to Mumbai Indians, or Kings XI Punjab before eventually returning to his home team of Delhi Capitals. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:97%;" |- !Player ! !Salary !From !To !Date !Ref |- |Quinton de Kock ||||||Royal Challengers Bangalore||Mumbai Indians||19 October 2018|| |- |Mandeep Singh||||||Royal Challengers Bangalore||Kings XI Punjab||rowspan="2"|28 October 2018|| |- |Marcus Stoinis||||||Kings XI Punjab||Royal Challengers Bangalore|| |- |Shikhar Dhawan|||||| Sunrisers Hyderabad||Delhi Capitals||rowspan="4"|5 November 2018|| |- |Vijay Shankar||||||rowspan="3"|Delhi Capitals||rowspan="3"|Sunrisers Hyderabad|| |- |Shahbaz Nadeem|||||| |- |Abhishek Sharma|||||| |} : ↓: Player(s) was/were swapped with the player(s) mentioned in the next row(s). : ↑: Player(s) was/were swapped with the player(s) mentioned in the previous row(s). ===Released players=== Gautam Gambhir, Yuvraj Singh and Glenn Maxwell were the prominent names among the released players. The auction was reckoned to be affected by limited availability of foreign players due to the 2019 Cricket World Cup. Initially 1003 players submitted their names for auction and the franchises were asked to submit their final shortlist by 10 December. 346 players were shortlisted. 5 more players were added to list on auction day making the final list to 351 including 228 Indian players. Ten players have listed themselves at the base price of Rs. 2 crore. 60 players were sold and amount of Rs.106.8 crore was spent in the auction. Jaydev Unadkat and uncapped Varun Chakravarthy were the costliest players at Rs.8.4 crore. Sam Curran was the most expensive foreign player at Rs. 7.2 crore. Prominent players like Cheteshwar Pujara, Brendon McCullum and Alex Hales remained unsold. ===Summary=== {| class=wikitable style="margin:0; font-size:90%; text-align:center" |+ Team summary |- ! rowspan="2" | Team ! rowspan="2" | Funds Remaining (₹ in Lacs) ! colspan="3" | In Auction ! colspan="3" | Overall (including Retained) |- !
